1: וְאַתָּה֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> שָׂ֣א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>Moreover take thou up</n> קִינָ֔ה <sup>7015 </sup> <n>a lamentation</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>for</n> נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <sup>5387 </sup> <n>for the princes</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
2: וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And say</n> מָ֤ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> אִמְּךָ֙ <sup>517 </sup> <n>your mother</n> לְבִיָּ֔א <sup>3833 </sup> <n>great</n> בֵּ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>among</n> אֲרָי֖וֹת <sup>738 </sup> <n>among lions</n> רָבָ֑צָה <sup>7257 </sup> <n>she lay down</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> כְּפִרִ֖ים <sup>3715 </sup> <n>young lions</n> רִבְּתָ֥ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>she nourished</n> גוּרֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>1482 </sup> <n>her whelps</n>
3: וַתַּ֛עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>And she brought up</n> אֶחָ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>one</n> מִגֻּרֶ֖יהָ <sup>1482 </sup> <n>of her whelps</n> כְּפִ֣יר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>it became a young lion</n> הָיָ֑ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> וַיִּלְמַ֥ד <sup>3925 </sup> <n>and it learned</n> לִטְרָף־ <sup>2963 </sup> <n>to catch</n> טֶ֖רֶף <sup>2964 </sup> <n>the prey</n> אָדָ֥ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>men</n> אָכָֽל׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>it devoured</n>
4: וַיִּשְׁמְע֥וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>also heard</n> אֵלָ֛יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> גּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>The nations</n> בְּשַׁחְתָּ֣ם <sup>7845 </sup> <n>in their pit</n> נִתְפָּ֑שׂ <sup>8610 </sup> <n>of him he was taken</n> וַיְבִאֻ֥הוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and they brought</n> בַֽחַחִ֖ים <sup>2397 </sup> <n>him with chains</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>unto the land</n> מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n>
5: וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Now when she saw</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נֽוֹחֲלָ֔ה <sup>3176 </sup> <n>that she had waited</n> אָבְדָ֖ה <sup>6 </sup> <n>was lost</n> תִּקְוָתָ֑הּ <sup>8615 </sup> <n>[and] her hope</n> וַתִּקַּ֛ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>then she took</n> אֶחָ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>another</n> מִגֻּרֶ֖יהָ <sup>1482 </sup> <n>of her whelps</n> כְּפִ֥יר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>him a young lion</n> שָׂמָֽתְהוּ׃ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>[and] made</n>
6: וַיִּתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>And he went up and down</n> בְּתוֹךְ־ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> אֲרָי֖וֹת <sup>738 </sup> <n>the lions</n> כְּפִ֣יר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>he became a young lion</n> הָיָ֑ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> וַיִּלְמַ֥ד <sup>3925 </sup> <n>and learned</n> לִטְרָף־ <sup>2963 </sup> <n>to catch</n> טֶ֖רֶף <sup>2964 </sup> <n>the prey</n> אָדָ֥ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>men</n> אָכָֽל׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>[and] devoured</n>
7: וַיֵּ֙דַע֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>And he knew</n> אַלְמְנוֹתָ֔יו <sup>490 </sup> <n>their desolate palaces</n> וְעָרֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>5892 </sup> <n>their cities</n> הֶחֱרִ֑יב <sup>2717 </sup> <n>and he laid waste</n> וַתֵּ֤שַׁם <sup>3456 </sup> <n>was desolate</n> אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the land</n> וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <sup>4393 </sup> <n>and the fulness</n> מִקּ֖וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>thereof by the noise</n> שַׁאֲגָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>7581 </sup> <n>of his roaring</n>
8: וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>set</n> עָלָ֥יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> גּוֹיִ֛ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>Then the nations</n> סָבִ֖יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>against him on every side</n> מִמְּדִינ֑וֹת <sup>4082 </sup> <n>from the provinces</n> וַֽיִּפְרְשׂ֥וּ <sup>6566 </sup> <n>and spread</n> עָלָ֛יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> רִשְׁתָּ֖ם <sup>7568 </sup> <n>their net</n> בְּשַׁחְתָּ֥ם <sup>7845 </sup> <n>in their pit</n> נִתְפָּֽשׂ׃ <sup>8610 </sup> <n>over him he was taken</n>
9: וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֤הוּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And they put</n> בַסּוּגַר֙ <sup>5474 </sup> <n>him in ward</n> בַּֽחַחִ֔ים <sup>2397 </sup> <n>in chains</n> וַיְבִאֻ֖הוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and brought</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>him to the king</n> בָּבֶ֑ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n> יְבִאֻ֙הוּ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>they brought</n> בַּמְּצֹד֔וֹת <sup>4686 </sup> <n>castle</n> לְמַ֗עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>So</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>should no more be heard</n> קוֹל֛וֹ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>that his voice</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>more</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> הָרֵ֥י <sup>2022 </sup> <n>upon the mountains</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> פ
10: אִמְּךָ֥ <sup>517 </sup> <n>Thy mother</n> כַגֶּ֛פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>[is] like a vine</n> בְּדָמְךָ֖ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>bloodshed</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>by</n> מַ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>by the waters</n> שְׁתוּלָ֑ה <sup>8362 </sup> <n>planted</n> פֹּֽרִיָּה֙ <sup>6509 </sup> <n>she was fruitful</n> וַֽעֲנֵפָ֔ה <sup>6058 </sup> <n>and full of branches</n> הָיְתָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מִמַּ֥יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> רַבִּֽים׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>by reason of many</n>
11: וַיִּֽהְיוּ־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>had</n> לָ֞הּ מַטּ֣וֹת <sup>4294 </sup> <n>rods</n> עֹ֗ז <sup>5797 </sup> <n>And she had strong</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> שִׁבְטֵי֙ <sup>7626 </sup> <n>for the sceptres</n> מֹֽשְׁלִ֔ים <sup>4910 </sup> <n>of them that bare rule</n> וַתִּגְבַּ֥הּ <sup>1361 </sup> <n>was exalted</n> קֽוֹמָת֖וֹ <sup>6967 </sup> <n>and her stature</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בֵּ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>among</n> עֲבֹתִ֑ים <sup>5688 </sup> <n>among the thick branches</n> וַיֵּרָ֣א <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and she appeared</n> בְגָבְה֔וֹ <sup>1363 </sup> <n>in her height</n> בְּרֹ֖ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>with the multitude</n> דָּלִיֹּתָֽיו׃ <sup>1808 </sup> <n>of her branches</n>
12: וַתֻּתַּ֤שׁ <sup>5428 </sup> <n>But she was plucked up</n> בְּחֵמָה֙ <sup>2534 </sup> <n>in fury</n> לָאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>to the ground</n> הֻשְׁלָ֔כָה <sup>7993 </sup> <n>she was cast down</n> וְר֥וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>wind</n> הַקָּדִ֖ים <sup>6921 </sup> <n>and the east</n> הוֹבִ֣ישׁ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>dried up</n> פִּרְיָ֑הּ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>her fruit</n> הִתְפָּרְק֧וּ <sup>6561 </sup> <n>were broken</n> וְיָבֵ֛שׁוּ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>and withered</n> מַטֵּ֥ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>rods</n> עֻזָּ֖הּ <sup>5797 </sup> <n>her strong</n> אֵ֥שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>the fire</n> אֲכָלָֽתְהוּ׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>consumed</n>
13: וְעַתָּ֖ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>and now</n> שְׁתוּלָ֣ה <sup>8362 </sup> <n>And now she [is] planted</n> בַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n> בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>ground</n> צִיָּ֥ה <sup>6723 </sup> <n>in a dry</n> וְצָמָֽא׃ <sup>6772 </sup> <n>and thirsty</n>
14: וַתֵּצֵ֨א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>is gone out</n> אֵ֜שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>And fire</n> מִמַּטֵּ֤ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>of a rod</n> בַדֶּ֙יהָ֙ <sup>905 </sup> <n>of her branches</n> פִּרְיָ֣הּ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>her fruit</n> אָכָ֔לָה <sup>398 </sup> <n>[which] hath devoured</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and has</n> הָ֥יָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בָ֛הּ מַטֵּה־ <sup>4294 </sup> <n>rod</n> עֹ֖ז <sup>5797 </sup> <n>so that she hath no strong</n> שֵׁ֣בֶט <sup>7626 </sup> <n>[to be] a sceptre</n> לִמְשׁ֑וֹל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>to rule</n> קִ֥ינָה <sup>7015 </sup> <n>This [is] a lamentation</n> הִ֖יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וַתְּהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְקִינָֽה׃ <sup>7015 </sup> <n>and shall be for a lamentation</n> פ
